Message.Msg: Yes its been rather obvious that he would not get financing and that his numbers were off. Atleast this spares Dell a lengthy lawsuit and nuisance factor of fees etc. The deal goes thru, the stock is gone at $13.65. July vote will pass with heavy majority. One can hope that as a private company and with smart people helping Michael that he can course correct the company. For those that want to make more than 2.5% in the next month, sell the Jan 15 2015 leaps. It free money as the stock will be sold for under the strike price and all options at or above 15 will expire worthless.
